siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门

siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
Jason Statham and director Guy Ritchie are back in action. Watch the WRATH OF MAN trailer now and see it in theaters on MAY 7. 

A mysterious and wild-eyed new cash truck security guard (Jason Statham) surprises his coworkers during a heist in which he unexpectedly unleashes precision skills. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman’s ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score.

Directed by: Guy Ritchie 
Screenplay by: Guy Ritchie and Ivan Atkinson and Marn Davies
Cast: Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Jeffrey Donovan, Josh Hartnett, Laz Alonzo, Raúl Castillo, Deobia Oparei with Eddie Marsan and Scott Eastwood
Rated R for strong violence throughout, persuasive language, and some sexual references

Connect with Wrath of Man: 
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/WrathFilm
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/wrathfilm/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/WrathFilm
#WrathOfMan #GuyRitchie

Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCf5CjDJvsFvtVIhkfmKAwAA?sub_confirmation=1
Watch more MGM videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwwhtOnMyjuwuyIiqdQaY_EshuP-u-9rg

Connect with MGM Studios Online
Visit the MGM Studios WEBSITE: http://www.mgm.com/ 
Check out MGM on TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@mgmstudios/ 
Follow MGM Studios on INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/mgmstudios/ 
Follow MGM Studios on TWITTER: https://twitter.com/MGM_Studios/ 
Like MGM Studios on FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/mgm/ 

About MGM Studios: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Inc. is a leading entertainment company focused on the production and distribution of film and television content globally.  The company owns one of the world’s deepest libraries of premium film and television content.  In addition, MGM has investments in domestic and international television channels, including MGM-branded channels.

WRATH OF MAN | Offical Trailer | MGM Studios 
https://www.youtube.com/MGM

#MGM

localize.title: 愤怒的男人｜官方预告片｜米高梅电影制片厂
localize.description:
杰森-斯坦森和导演盖-里奇又开始行动了。现在观看《人之怒》预告片，5月7日上映。

在一次抢劫中，一个神秘而眼神狂野的新运钞车保安（杰森-斯坦森饰）出乎意料地释放出精准的技能，给同事们带来惊喜。队员们都很好奇他是谁，他从哪里来。很快，这位神枪手的最终动机变得清晰起来，他采取了戏剧性的、不可改变的步骤来解决一笔账。

导演： 盖-里奇 
编剧： 盖-里奇和伊万-阿特金森以及马恩-戴维斯 盖-里奇和伊万-阿特金森以及马恩-戴维斯
演员： Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Jeffrey Donovan, Josh Hartnett, Laz Alonzo, Raúl Castillo, Deobia Oparei with Eddie Marsan and Scott Eastwood.
由于整个过程中存在强烈的暴力，有说服力的语言和一些性暗示，被评为R级。

与 "人之怒 "联系。
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/WrathFilm
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/wrathfilm/

#WrathOfMan #GuyRitchie

localize.title: 憤怒的男人｜官方預告片｜米高梅電影製片廠
localize.description:
傑森-斯坦森和導演蓋-裏奇又開始行動了。現在觀看《人之怒》預告片，5月7日上映。

在一次搶劫中，一個神祕而眼神狂野的新運鈔車保安（傑森-斯坦森飾）出乎意料地釋放出精準的技能，給同事們帶來驚喜。隊員們都很好奇他是誰，他從哪裏來。很快，這位神槍手的最終動機變得清晰起來，他採取了戲劇性的、不可改變的步驟來解決一筆賬。

導演： 蓋-裏奇 
編劇： 蓋-裏奇和伊萬-阿特金森以及馬恩-戴維斯 蓋-裏奇和伊萬-阿特金森以及馬恩-戴維斯
演員： Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Jeffrey Donovan, Josh Hartnett, Laz Alonzo, Raúl Castillo, Deobia Oparei with Eddie Marsan and Scott Eastwood.
由於整個過程中存在強烈的暴力，有說服力的語言和一些性暗示，被評爲R級。

與 "人之怒 "聯繫。

next.excerpt:
No. 1 UConn plays No. 2 Baylor in the Elite Eight of the 2021 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament.

The Huskies used a giant second-half rally to come back and take down the Lady Bears 69-67. A 19-0 UConn run was the difference, which came after Baylor senior guard Didi Richards left the game with a left leg injury in the third quarter.

The Bears nearly mounted a comeback of their own, falling just short in the final moments as the Huskies held on to advance to their 13th Final Four in a row.

Subscribe to the NCAA Championship YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/NCAAChampionships?sub_confirmation=1
next.title: UConn vs. Baylor - Elite Eight Women's NCAA Tournament Extended Highlights

localize.title: UConn vs. Baylor - 八强赛女子NCAA锦标赛延伸精彩片段
localize.description:
在2021年NCAA女篮锦标赛八强赛中，排名第一的康州大学对阵排名第二的贝勒大学。

哈斯基队利用下半场的巨大反击，以69-67拿下熊女士。一波19-0的攻势成为差异，这是在第三节贝勒大将迪迪-理查兹因左腿受伤离场之后。

熊队差点发动自己的反击，最后时刻只差一点，哈斯基队连续第13次挺进四强。

订阅NCAA锦标赛YouTube频道：https://www.youtube.com/NCAAChampionships?sub_confirmation=1。

localize.title: UConn vs. Baylor - 八強賽女子NCAA錦標賽延伸精彩片段
localize.description:
在2021年NCAA女籃錦標賽八強賽中，排名第一的康州大學對陣排名第二的貝勒大學。

哈斯基隊利用下半場的巨大反擊，以69-67拿下熊女士。一波19-0的攻勢成爲差異，這是在第三節貝勒大將迪迪-理查茲因左腿受傷離場之後。

熊隊差點發動自己的反擊，最後時刻只差一點，哈斯基隊連續第13次挺進四強。

訂閱NCAA錦標賽YouTube頻道：https://www.youtube.com/NCAAChampionships?sub_confirmation=1。
